quote.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quote.author: Winston Churchill

quote.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quote.author: Steve Jobs

quote.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quote.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote.text: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
quote.author: Wayne Gretzky

quote.text: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
quote.author: William Butler Yeats

quote.text: Everything you can imagine is real.
quote.author: Pablo Picasso

quote.text: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
quote.author: Dalai Lama

quote.text: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
quote.author: Booker T. Washington

quote.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quote.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote.text: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
quote.author: Aristotle

quote.text: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
quote.author: Mae West

quote.text: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quote.author: Nelson Mandela

quote.text: Whether you think you can, or you think you can’t – you’re right.
quote.author: Henry Ford

quote.text: Your time is limited, don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
quote.author: Steve Jobs

quote.text: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
quote.author: Muhammad Ali
